channel.title: Living in the US and didn't see a place to specify state on the order form
channel.description:
As an American, I demand that all order forms include "State" in the shipping details, no matter where they're from internationally! :fireworks:
Totally kidding. However, I rarely order anything internationally so I want to make sure that, without the state on the order form, even with the zip code attached, it's going to the right place. Can anyone from the US assuage my anxieties?
Otherwise, who should I contact in order to add the state to my shipping details?
Excited to join the community, thanks!

item.title: Living in the US and didn't see a place to specify state on the order form
item.dc:creator: @ivofx Ivo Grigull
item.description:
@ivofx wrote:

@tele_player Funny, I got exactly the same amounts, 4 Axolotis and pre-ordered one Akso. Only using one so far, but I do many plans for using the other 3, they will bring otherwise unused midi-controllers back to life

Read full topic
item.source: Living in the US and didn't see a place to specify state on the order form

item.title: Living in the US and didn't see a place to specify state on the order form
item.dc:creator: @tele_player
item.description:
@tele_player wrote:

I recently got two more, now I have 4. One I use for experimenting, it has AxoControl, three are spares. And a new Akso should arrive here in the next week or two.

One of these days I’ll actually commit some to dedicated builds.

Read full topic

item.title: Living in the US and didn't see a place to specify state on the order form
item.dc:creator: @hitachii Hitachii
item.description:
@hitachii wrote:

Awesome, thanks for the peace of mind!

I'm seeing that a bunch of people have multiple Axolotis. Are you using each of yours as a separate synth?

Read full topic
item.source: Living in the US and didn't see a place to specify state on the order form

item.title: Living in the US and didn't see a place to specify state on the order form
item.dc:creator: @tele_player
item.description:
@tele_player wrote:

I’ve ordered Axolotis three times. I’m surprised I missed that detail, but I just looked at the boxes, and none has the state.

Needless to say, they all got to me in California. I doubt it even slowed them down.

The way zip codes work, city and state are mostly redundant in addresses.

Read full topic
item.source: Living in the US and didn't see a place to specify state on the order form
